mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, RES_CODE, RES_NAME, PARENT_CODE, ICON, RES_DESC, RES_TYPE, SEQUENCE, CREATOR, UPDATER, IS_DELETE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, COMMENTS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_resource
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_resource (SEQ_ID, RES_CODE, RES_NAME, PARENT_CODE, ICON, RES_DESC, RES_TYPE, SEQUENCE, CREATOR, UPDATER, IS_DELETE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, COMMENTS) values (#{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{resCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sys_resource
SEQ_ID,
RES_CODE,
RES_NAME,
PARENT_CODE,
ICON,
RES_DESC,
RES_TYPE,
SEQUENCE,
CREATOR,
UPDATER,
IS_DELETE,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
COMMENTS,

mapper.update:
update sys_resource
SEQ_ID = #{record.seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
RES_CODE = #{record.resCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_NAME = #{record.resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_CODE = #{record.parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_DESC = #{record.resDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_TYPE = #{record.resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEQUENCE = #{record.sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATER = #{record.updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMMENTS = #{record.comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update sys_resource set SEQ_ID = #{record.seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, RES_CODE = #{record.resCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_NAME = #{record.resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_CODE = #{record.parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{record.icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_DESC = #{record.resDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_TYPE = #{record.resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQUENCE = #{record.sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATER = #{record.updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETE = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENTS = #{record.comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_resource
RES_CODE = #{resCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_NAME = #{resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_CODE = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_DESC = #{resDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_TYPE = #{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEQUENCE = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMMENTS = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_resource set RES_CODE = #{resCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_NAME = #{resName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_CODE = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICON = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_DESC = #{resDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RES_TYPE = #{resType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEQUENCE = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENTS = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
